enc_wrapper module¶

A wrapper for public key authenticated encryption using Diffie Hellman key exchange to set up a symmetric encryption.

enc_wrapper.as_init_encryption(kp, c_pk)[source]¶

Given an initialised keypair kp and a counterparty pubkey c_pk, create a Box ready for encryption/decryption.

enc_wrapper.decode_decrypt(msg, box)[source]¶
enc_wrapper.encrypt_encode(msg, box)[source]¶
enc_wrapper.get_pubkey(kp, as_hex=False)[source]¶

Given a keypair object, return its public key, optionally in hex.

enc_wrapper.init_keypair(fname=None)[source]¶

Create a new encryption keypair; stored in file fname if provided. The keypair object is returned.

enc_wrapper.init_pubkey(hexpk, fname=None)[source]¶

Create a pubkey object from a hex formatted string. Save to file fname if specified.

enc_wrapper.test_case(case_name, alice_box, bob_box, ab_message, ba_message, num_iterations=1)[source]¶
enc_wrapper.test_keypair_setup()[source]¶
